verses.arabic: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.english: By the mount
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da ¦ũr (Dũtsen Mũsã).

verses.arabic: وَكِتَـٰبٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.english: And [by] a Book inscribed
verses.hausa: Da wani littãfi rubũtacce.

verses.arabic: فِى رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.english: In parchment spread open
verses.hausa: A cikin wata takardar fãta shimfiɗaɗɗa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
verses.english: And [by] the frequented House
verses.hausa: Da Gidan da aka rãyar da shi (da ibãda).

verses.arabic: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.english: And [by] the heaven raised high
verses.hausa: Da rufin nan da aka ɗaukaka.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
verses.english: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],
verses.hausa: Da tẽkun nan da aka cika (da ruwa).

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌ
verses.english: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.
verses.hausa: Lalle, azãbar Ubangijinka, haƙĩƙa, mai aukuwa ce.

verses.arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.english: Of it there is no preventer.
verses.hausa: Bã ta da mai tunkuɗẽwa.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًا
verses.english: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion
verses.hausa: Rãnar da samã ke yin mõtsi tanã kai kãwo.

verses.arabic: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.english: And the mountains will pass on, departing -
verses.hausa: Kuma duwãtsu nã tafiya sunã shũɗẽwa.

verses.arabic: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.english: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,
verses.hausa: To, bone yã tabbata a rãnar nan ga mãsu ƙaryatãwa.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.english: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke a cikin kududdufi sunã wãsã.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.english: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],
verses.hausa: Rãnar da zã a tunkuɗa su zuwa wutar Jahannama, tunkuɗãwa.

verses.arabic: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.english: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.
verses.hausa: (A ce musu): "Wannan ita ce wutar da kuka kasance kunã ƙaryatãwa game da ita."

verses.arabic: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.english: Then is this magic, or do you not see?
verses.hausa: "To, shin wannan sihiri ne kõ kuwa kũ ne bã ku gani?"

verses.arabic: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."
verses.hausa: "Ku shigẽ ta. To, ku yi haƙuri ko kuma kada ku yi haƙuri, dai dai ne a kanku, kawai anã yi muku sakamakon abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,
verses.hausa: Lalle, mãsu taƙawa, sunã a cikin gidãjen Aljanna da wata ni'ima.

verses.arabic: فَـٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.english: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.
verses.hausa: Sunã mãsu jin dãɗi da abin da Ubangijinsu Ya ba su, kuma Ubangijinsu Ya tsãre musu azãbar Jahĩm.

verses.arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
verses.hausa: (A ce musu): "Ku ci, ku sha, da ni'ima, dõmin abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.english: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
verses.hausa: Sunã kishingiɗe a kan karagu waɗanda ke cikin sahu, kuma Muka aurar da su waɗansu mãtã mãsu farin idãnu, mãsu girmansu.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَـٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَـٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.english: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma zũriyarsu suka bĩ su ga ĩmãnin, Mun riskar da zũriyarsu da su, alhãli kuwa bã da Mun rage musu kõme ba daga aikinsu, kõwane mutum jingina ne ga abin da ya sana'anta.

verses.arabic: وَأَمْدَدْنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.english: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka yalwata musu 'ya'yan itãce da nãma irin wanda suke marmari.

verses.arabic: يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.english: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.
verses.hausa: Sunã mĩƙa wa jũnansu a cikinta hinjãlan giya, wadda bãbu yãsassar magana a cikinta, kuma bãbu jin nauyin zunubi.

verses.arabic: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.english: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗansu samãri nã gẽwayãwa a kansu, kamar dai sũ lu'ulu'u ne wanda ke kulle.

verses.arabic: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.english: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.
verses.hausa: Waɗansunsu suka fuskanta zuwa ga waɗansu, sunã tambayar jũna.

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.english: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Lalle mũ mun kasance a gabãnin wannan (a dũniya) a cikin iyãlanmu munã jin tsõro."

verses.arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.english: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.
verses.hausa: "To, Allah Yã yi mana kyautar falala, kuma Yã tsare mana azãbar iskar zãfi."

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.english: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."
verses.hausa: "Lalle mũ mun kasance, a gãbanin haka, munã kiran sa. Lalle Shĩ, Shĩ ne Mai kyautatãwa, Mai rahama."

verses.arabic: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.english: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.
verses.hausa: To, ka tunãtar kai fa sabõda ni'imar Ubangjinka, bã bõka kake ba, kuma bã mahaukaci ba.

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ
verses.english: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"
verses.hausa: Shin zã su ce: "Mawãƙi ne, munã jiran, masĩfun mutuwa game da shĩ"?

verses.arabic: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.english: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ku yi jira, domin nĩ ma lalle inã a cikin mãsu jira tãre da ku."

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.english: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?
verses.hausa: Shin, hankulansu ne ke umarin su da wannan, kõ kuwa sũ wasu mutãne ne mãsu ƙetare haddi?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.
verses.hausa: Shin, cẽwa suke yi: "Shi ne ke ƙãga faɗarsa"? Ã'a ba su dai yi ĩmãni ba.

verses.arabic: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.
verses.hausa: Sai su zõ da wani lãbãri mai misãlinsa idan sun kasance sũmãsu gaskiya ne.

verses.arabic: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِقُونَ
verses.english: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?
verses.hausa: Shin, an halitta su ne bã daga kõme ba, kõ kuwa sũ ne mãsu yin halitta?

verses.arabic: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.english: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.
verses.hausa: Shin, sun halitta sammai da ƙasa ne? Ã'a ba su dai yi ĩmãnin yaƙĩni ba.

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ
verses.english: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?
verses.hausa: Shin, taskõkin Ubangijinka, sunã a wurinsu ne? Kõ kuwa sũ ne mãsu rinjãya?

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.
verses.hausa: Shin, sunã da wani tsãni ne wanda suke (hawa sunã) saurãron (lãbãrin samã) a cikinsa? Sai mai saurarõnsu ya zo da wani dalĩli bayyananne.

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ
verses.english: Or has He daughters while you have sons?
verses.hausa: Shin, Yanã da 'ya'ya mãtã ne kuma kũ, kunã da ɗiya maza ne?

verses.arabic: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.english: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?
verses.hausa: Shin, kanã tambayar su wata ijãra ne, sabõda haka suka zama mãsu jin nauyin biyan tãrar?

verses.arabic: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.english: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?
verses.hausa: Shin, a wurinsu akwai ilmin gaibi, sabõda haka sunã rubũtãwa?

verses.arabic: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.english: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.
verses.hausa: Shin, sunã nufin wani kaidi ne? To, waɗanda suka kãfirta sũ ne waɗanda ake yi wa kaidi.

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
verses.hausa: Shin, sunã da wani abin bautãwa ne wanda bã Allah ba? Tsarki ya tabbata ga Allah daga abin da suke yi na shirki!

verses.arabic: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.english: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan sun ga wani ɓaɓɓake daga samã yãnã fãɗuwa, sai su ce wani girgije ne, mai hauhawar jũna.

verses.arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.english: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -
verses.hausa: To, ka bar su, sai sun haɗu da yinin nan da za a sũmar da su a cikinsa.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.english: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.
verses.hausa: Rãnar da kaidinsu bã ya wadãtar masu da kõme, kuma bã a taimakon su.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, waɗannan da suka yi zãluncin, sunã da azãba (a nan dũniya) banda waccan, kuma mafi yawansu ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.english: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.
verses.hausa: Sai ka yi hakuri da hukuncin Ubangijinka, lalle kai fa kanã idãnunMu, kuma ka tsarkake Ubangijinka da (tasbĩhi) game da gõde Masa a lõkacin da kake tãshi tsaye (dõmin salla kõ wani abu).

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.english: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.
verses.hausa: Kuma daga dare, sai ka tsarkake Shi (da tasbĩhin) dalõkacin jũyãwar taurãri.
